===Fedora 10===
===Fedora 10===
â
Fedora 10, codenamed "Cambridge", is set for release on [[18 November]] [[2008]].<ref name="F10-ReleaseSchedule">{{ cite web | url=http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Releases/10/Schedule?oldid=46700 | title=Fedora 10 Release Schedule | publisher=[[The Fedora Project]] | date=2008-08-28 | accessdate=2008-09-08 }}</ref> Planned features include a web based package installer similar to Linux Mint's, a faster startup that does not use Red Hat Graphical Boot, better webcam support, GNOME 2.24, KDE 4.1 and RPM 4.6. <!--Update this to a list ASAP-->
+
Fedora 10, codenamed "Cambridge", is set for release on [[18 November]] [[2008]].<ref name="F10-ReleaseSchedule">{{ cite web | url=http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Releases/10/Schedule?oldid=46700 | title=Fedora 10 Release Schedule | publisher=[[The Fedora Project]] | date=2008-08-28 | accessdate=2008-09-08 }}</ref> Planned features include a web based package installer similar to [[Linux Mint]]'s, a faster startup that does not use Red Hat Graphical Boot, better webcam support, GNOME 2.24, KDE 4.1 and RPM 4.6. <!--Update this to a list ASAP-->
